title: Public transport for Blink 182 World Tour: Tuesday 13, Wednesday 14, Monday 26, Tuesday 27 and Thursday 29 February 2024
articleContent:
Public transport for Blink 182 World Tour: Tuesday 13, Wednesday 14, Monday 26, Tuesday 27 and Thursday 29 February 2024

Events > Music

Multi-platinum, award-winning group blink-182 reunite on tour for the first time in nearly 10 years.

Extra services will help you get to and from Rod Laver Arena on Tuesday 13, Wednesday 14, Monday 26, Tuesday 27 and Thursday 29 February 2024.

The event will begin at 6.30pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Normal services operating from Richmond Station

Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from Rod Laver Arena

Route 70

  • Passengers can catch tram services alighting at Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from the Rod Laver Arena

Passengers can catch the following buses close to the Rod Laver Arena:

  • Route 246 (please note services may terminate prior to the end of the match)

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

Regional train

  • Normal services departing from Southern Cross Station
articleDescription: Public transport for Blink 182 World Tour: 13th & 14th, 26th to 27th and 28th February 2024
